universal_guidelines.theme_toggle: Must be present in Topbar or Sidebar footer
universal_guidelines.country_selector: Prominent in Topbar - this is a multi-country platform
universal_guidelines.loading_states: Use Skeleton components for all data-fetching states
universal_guidelines.error_states: Use Sonner toasts for API errors, Alert components for critical page errors
universal_guidelines.empty_states: Show clear 'No results found' with an action button when tables are empty

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Update tailwind.config.js to use the HSL variables defined in 'colors' section. Ensure 'Manrope' and 'Inter' fonts are imported.
instructions_to_main_agent.shadcn: Customize default shadcn components to match the 'radius' and 'colors' defined here.
instructions_to_main_agent.data_density: For tables, use 'compact' density. Avoid excessive padding in data rows. Use 'whitespace-nowrap' for cells to keep rows aligned.
instructions_to_main_agent.dark_mode: Default to system preference but persist user choice. Ensure borders in dark mode are subtle (border-white/10) to avoid visual clutter.
